text: Oleh Meydanovych Babayev (; 21 October 1965 - 26 July 2014) was a Ukrainian politician and businessman. He was the Mayor of Kremenchuk, Poltava Oblast from 2010 until his death. He was also the owner of two football teams in Poltava Oblast. Babayev was born in Kursk, Kursk Oblast which was then part of the Russian SFSR in the Soviet Union. He was of Azerbaijani ancestry. Babayev was shot dead on 26 July 2014 outside his home in Kremenchuk, aged 48. He had three shotgun wounds. ==References== ==Other websites== * Oleh Babayev Category:1965 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Assassinated Ukrainian people Category:Ukrainian businesspeople Category:Murders by firearm Category:Ukrainian mayors Category:People from Poltava Oblast Category:People from Kursk Oblast
title: Oleh Babayev
